name: The Crystal Cavern
description:
The Crystal Cavern is a game created in 72 hours for the Ludum Dare 48 game jam! The theme was 'deeper and deeper.'

It is an endless runner where the environment gets darker the farther you run until you are only left with the light emitted by the player character. The aim of the game is to avoid the crystals and get as deep into the cave as possible.

Comments and feedback are appreciated!

*Some sounds used in this game were downloaded from mixkit.co and tabletopaudio.com.
